description.value: Veteran Talent Requirement: Character suffers 5+ Critical Damage in a Single Battle during a mission and survives. If this character would be rendered unconcious by a Critical Effect or excessive Fatigue, they can make a +0 Willpower Test. If successful they remain conccious, but suffer 1 Damage ignoring Armour and Toughness at the end of each of their turns. At the beginning of each turn they may choose to collapse to end the damaging effect.
